Name: Hellfire
About the game: Originally released in 1984 for the ZX Spectrum, this classic arcade-like game saw players take on the role of the mythical hero Ulysses as he performs a series of tasks, set by the gods to prove his worthiness. Now, relive those days in this remastered emulated version. Gameplay Climb the precarious slopes of Mount Olympus, dodging falling rocks. Use your shield against the Gorgon's deadly stare. Sneak past Minotaurs in a labarynthine temple. Search an isometric maze for the weapons needed to fight fearsome monsters. This enhanced version introduces a number of modern features to this retro classic, including: Saving/loading the game at any point Support for most modern game controllers Full control remapping Image scaling and smoothing options
